label: DelimitedPeriod
comment: A period of time from a start date time onwards up to an end date time.

datatypeProperties.comment: A measure of the length of time for this specified time period such as hours, days, weeks, months, years.
The date, time, date time or other date time value for the end of this available period of time.
The date, time, date time or other date time value for the start of this available period of time.

referencedBy.comment: A period of time from a start date time onwards up to an end date time.
A period of time from a start date time onwards up to an end date time.
